teammembers.name: Sanjana Kapur
teammembers.title: President
teammembers.bio: Sanjana has been swimming for over 16 years. Her dream was to someday create a company based around helping new swimmers. Sanjana created this company with hopes that new swimmers would sign up for classes and enjoy swimming just like she does.

teammembers.name: Mitika Kapur
teammembers.title: Vice President
teammembers.bio: Damon is the Director of Development for Vecta Corp. Damon creates learning materials for Vecta Corp. as well as consulting for customers to integrate vSolutions into their production pipeline and business processes.

teammembers.name: Aditya Kapur
teammembers.title: Director of Development
teammembers.bio: Aditya joined Pure Lap in April 2022 as the Director of Development
